EmailTemplate.subject: VlogStar Challenge on Friday 19th of February
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there {!Contact.Name},
Just a quick reminder that the VlogStar Challenge workshop is coming up this Friday! Its a fantastic event and will teach you all about how to shoot a vlog, about lighting, sound and focusing, how to bring your personality onto screen, and how to build your personal brand!
You will also get a chance to submit your video and could win Â£500 worth of equipment, 1-2-1 mentoring from YouTube experts and use of YouTube production space!
Here is some more information for you:
When: Friday 19th of February between 09:45 - 15:00
Where: Waterloo Action Centre, 14 Baylis Road, Waterloo, SE1 7AA - here is a link to a map.
We will be providing breakfast and snacks on the day so please let me know if you have any dietary requirements.
You will also get:
***Training in public speaking, sales techniques and marketing***
***A FREE Ticket to our NCS Action Day Party on Saturday 5th of March**
***This opportunity also counts towards our graduate Awards scheme***
***Finally you will be entered into our half term events draw and could win a Beats Pill Portable Speaker!***
You will need to have access to a smartphone or a tablet for this workshop - please let me know if you would like me to bring one from the office.
If you would like travel costs reimbursed please ensure you bring a receipt and speak to a member of staff.
If you can no longer attend please do let me know as this workshop is full and we have a few young people on a waiting list.
I look forward to seeing you,
Rhiannon
Graduate Associate Manager 07876836445
